text: I would like to tell all investors that you should choose a good broker and not go with Go because I have a demat account in the group. I feel that there are a lot of bugs in the group. title: Guru Charan Das Tadiparty
text: Quite nice but needs improvement. It's simple and easy to use and all this happens quickly. I use it for mutual funds. Further, you can also import your investment outside Groww for anoverall view. Purchase and sale are easy too. The downsides are. 1. No cap-wise details of individual funds. 2. Takes too long to reflect recent values of NAVs. 3. No provision to cancel or stop external MFs, while redemption can happen. Overall a good platform for individual investors but can be improved further.
author: Guru Charan Das Tadiparty
